info.title: True Finals API
info.description: OpenAPI compliant REST API for True Finals

get.summary: Get a list of all tournaments owned by the API user (with some details)
Get a tournament's private data by ID. Available only to tournament owners
Get a tournament's webhooks. Available only to tournament owners

post.summary: Update a tournament's webhooks. Overrides existing webhooks.

get.summary: Get a tournament's details by ID.
Get a JSON representation of a tournament's description.

post.summary: Update a tournament's description.

get.summary: Get a tournament's current overlay params.

post.summary: Update a tournament's overlay params.
Create a new tournament.
Start a tournament. Allows games to progress.
Reset a tournament. It will need to be started again to progress.
Push the scheduled time of all unfinished games in a tournament

get.summary: Get all games of a tournament.

post.summary: Add an exhibition game to a tournament.
Update a game.
Bulk add exhibition games to a tournament.
Bulk delete exhibition games.
Update the score of a game.
Update the state of a game.
Update the scheduled start time of a game.
Update the location of a game.
Update the checkin status of a game's player.
Undo a game that has ended, resetting all fields.

get.summary: Get all locations of a tournament.

post.summary: Add a location to a tournament.

delete.summary: Delete a location from a tournament.

post.summary: Start the first queued game at a location.
Stop the active game at a location.
Update the score of the active (or first) game at a location.

get.summary: Get all players in a tournament

post.summary: Add a player to a tournament.

delete.summary: Delete a player from a tournament. The tournament must not have started yet.

post.summary: Reseed a player in a tournament. The tournament must not have started yet.
Randomize the seeding of a tournament. The tournament must not have started yet.
Specify a complete list of players. Existing players will be updated, new players will be added, and players not in the list will be deleted.
Check a player into their upcoming match.
Disqualify a player from a tournament. Disqualified players can no longer compete
